00042 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator() : n(0), own_data(true) {};
00043 
00044 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00045                                    const EGS_Float *values) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00046     initialize(nbin,Xmin,Xmax,values);
00047 }

00049 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00050                                    EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func, void *data) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00051     initialize(nbin,Xmax,Xmax,func,data);
00052 }

00054 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00055                                    EGS_Float *a, EGS_Float *b) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00056     initialize(nbin,Xmax,Xmax,a,b);

00058 
00059 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00060                                    EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func, void *data,
00061                                    int nmax, EGS_Float accu) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00062     initialize(Xmin,Xmax,func,data,nmax,accu);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void EGS_Interpolator::clear() {
00066     if (n > 0 && own_data) {
00067         delete [] a;
00068         delete [] b;
00069         n = 0;
00070     }
00071 }
00072 
00073 EGS_Interpolator::~EGS_Interpolator() {
00074     clear();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void EGS_Interpolator::check(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax) {
00078     if (nbin < 2) egsFatal("EGS_Interpolator::initialize: \n"
00079                                "    attempt to initialize the interpolator with %d bins\n",nbin);
00080     if (Xmin >= Xmax) egsFatal("EGS_Interpolator::initialize: \n"
00081                                    "    Xmin must be > Xmax, I got Xmin=%g Xmax=%g\n",Xmin,Xmax);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00085                                   const EGS_Float *values) {
00086     check(nbin,Xmin,Xmax);
00087     clear();
00088     own_data = true;
00089     n = nbin - 1;
00090     a = new EGS_Float [n], b = new EGS_Float [n];
00091     xmin = Xmin;
00092     xmax = Xmax;
00093     fmin = values[0];
00094     fmax = values[n];
00095     EGS_Float dx = (xmax-xmin)/n;
00096     bx = 1/dx;
00097     ax = -xmin*bx;
00098     for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00099         b[j] = (values[j+1]-values[j])*bx;
00100         a[j] = values[j] - b[j]*(xmin + dx*j);
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00105                                   EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func,void *data) {
00106     EGS_Float *aux = new EGS_Float [nbin];
00107     EGS_Float dx = (Xmax - Xmin)/(nbin-1);
00108     for (int j=0; j<nbin; j++) {
00109         aux[j] = func(Xmin + dx*j, data);
00110     }
00111     initialize(nbin,Xmin,Xmax,aux);
00112     delete [] aux;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00116                                   EGS_Float *A, EGS_Float *B) {
00117     check(nbin,Xmin,Xmax);
00118     clear();
00119     own_data = false;
00120     n = nbin - 1;
00121     xmin = Xmin;
00122     xmax = Xmax;
00123     EGS_Float dx = (xmax-xmin)/n;
00124     bx = 1/dx;
00125     ax = -xmin*bx;
00126     a = A;
00127     b = B;
00128     fmin = a[0] + b[0]*xmin;
00129     fmax = a[n-1]+b[n-1]*xmax;
00130 }
00131 
00132 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00133                                   EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func, void *data,
00134                                   int nmax, EGS_Float accu) {
00135     check(nmax,Xmin,Xmax);
00136     clear();
00137     if (nmax <= 9) {
00138         initialize(nmax,Xmin,Xmax,func,data);
00139         return;
00140     }
00141     int nnow = 9;
00142     EGS_Float *tmp = new EGS_Float [nnow];
00143     int j;
00144     EGS_Float ddx = (Xmax-Xmin)/(nnow-1);
00145     for (j=0; j<nnow; j++) {
00146         tmp[j] = func(Xmin + ddx*j, data);
00147     }
00148     while (1) {
00149         EGS_Float *tmp1 = new EGS_Float [nnow-1];
00150         for (j=0; j<nnow-1; j++) {
00151             tmp1[j] = func(Xmin + ddx*(0.5+j),data);
00152         }
00153         bool ok = true;
00154         for (j=0; j<nnow-1; j++) {
00155             EGS_Float fint = 0.5*(tmp[j] + tmp[j+1]);
00156             EGS_Float err = fabs(fint/tmp1[j]-1);
00157             if (err > accu) {
00158                 ok = false;
00159                 break;
00160             }
00161         }
00162         if (ok) {
00163             initialize(nnow,Xmin,Xmax,tmp);
00164             delete [] tmp;
00165             delete [] tmp1;
00166             return;
00167         }
00168         if (2*nnow-1 > nmax) {
00169             delete [] tmp;
00170             delete [] tmp1;
00171             break;
00172         }
00173         EGS_Float *aux = new EGS_Float [2*nnow-1];
00174         aux[0] = tmp[0];
00175         int i = 1;
00176         for (j=1; j<nnow; j++) {
00177             aux[i++] = tmp1[j-1];
00178             aux[i++] = tmp[j];
00179         }
00180         delete [] tmp;
00181         delete [] tmp1;
00182         tmp = aux;
00183         nnow = 2*nnow-1;
00184         ddx = (Xmax-Xmin)/(nnow-1);
00185     }
00186     initialize(nmax,Xmin,Xmax,func,data);
00187 }
